titleStmt.title: A godly meditacion vpon. xx. select and chosen Psalmes of the prophet Dauid as wel necessary to al them that are desirous to haue ye darke wordes of the prophet declared and made playn: as also fruitfull to suche as delyte in the contemplatio[n] of the spiritual meanyng of them. Compiled and set furth by Sir Anthony Cope knight.
titleStmt.author: Cope, Anthony, Sir, d. 1551.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Sepulchres paryshe a lytle aboue Holborne Conduite at the sygne of the Resurrection by [R. Grafton for?] Ihon Daye,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
